question: In genetics, the Reverse transcriptase helps in which among the following transcriptions?
option1: Single stranded DNA into double stranded DNA
option2: Single stranded RNA into double stranded DNA
option3: Single Stranded RNA into double stranded RNA
option4: Double Stranded DNA into single stranded RNA
answer: Single stranded RNA into double stranded DNA
explanation: Reverse transcriptase helps in Single Stranded RNA into double stranded RNA transcriptions. Reverse transcriptase (RT), also known as RNA-dependent DNA polymerase. It is used to generate complementary DNA (cDNA) from an RNA template.
